properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
SIX PERSONS OVERBOARD FROM VESSEL, WHITE HULL,
CAPSIZED AND ADRIFT IN 47-56.47S 045-34.47W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO NAVAREA VI,
INMARSAT-C: 470100125,
PHONE: 5429 3248 7150, 5411 4301 2249,
5429 3248 7162, 5411 4301 0061, 5411 4301 0067,
EXT 4028, FAX: 5411 4301 2249,
E-MAIL: snautica@hidro.gov.ar,
shn_orgint@hidro.gov.ar.
